name: Alpine Forget-Me-Not
description: A small, flowering plant with blue blooms.

name: Lodgepole Pine Tree
description: A tall tree with a straight trunk and needle-like leaves.

name: Quaking Aspen Tree
description: A small tree with heart-shaped leaves and a spreading canopy.

name: Bristlecone Pine Tree
description: A small tree with twisted branches and needle-like leaves.

name: Black Spruce Tree
description: A small to medium-sized tree with needle-like leaves and a conical shape.

name: Paper Birch Tree
description: A medium-sized tree with white bark and leaves that turn yellow in the fall.

name: Blueberry Bush
description: A small shrub with blue berries and green leaves.

name: Labrador Tea
description: A small shrub with white flowers and leaves that resemble tea leaves.

name: Tamarack Tree
description: A small to medium-sized tree with needle-like leaves and a conical shape.

name: Bilberry Bush
description: A small shrub with blue berries and green leaves.

name: Red Osier Dogwood
description: A small shrub with red stems and white flowers.
